description:
Fire and his friends successfully defeat Kanicrab but also find a mysterious card without a name.  After summoning, a warrior appeared but he had no memories!  When all of the sudden Kidoly, who claims to be Demon King Azul’s servant, appears in search of the warrior!  What exactly is this warrior’s identity!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Oreca That Lost Its Memories
